amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to expanding health savings accounts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 253 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 48.

action.text: Amendment SA 253 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S456-457; text: CR S456) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to expanding health savings accounts.
